summary:
easier then the Lets Get Rich hunt
Confined to the city\'s and surrounding Area
descriptionHtml:
easier then the Lets Get Rich hunt
Confined to the city\'s and surrounding Area
No play on word\'s or any of that, like in the last one.
this is really straight forward in the clues 
should be easy for all the one\'s that haven\'t found all map markers    

this one starts at the upper guard tower in Markarth
10 in all to find
follow the clue\'s in each chest.
author: SirDraconian
